title: English Learning Strategy Development Course for Adult Science Field Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic English grammar and vocabulary, along with workplace English communication experience
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum for science sector managers, prioritizing job-specific strategic training over cultural background considerations

learning_goals: Enhancing English communication skills in work environments utilizing specialized scientific terminology
Cultivating the ability to handle unpredictable communication situations through compensatory strategies (e.g., context-specific alternative expressions)
Developing the capacity to create personalized learning plans through analysis of learning strategy usage patterns

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
